subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The senior forward Marcus Johnson had 19 points and 9 rebounds to lead Southern California to a 67-56 victory over Nevada-Las Vegas in the championship game of the Diamond Head Classic in Honolulu.
snippet: The senior forward Marcus Johnson had 19 points and 9 rebounds to lead Southern California to a 67-56 victory over Nevada-Las Vegas in the championship game of the Diamond Head Classic in Honolulu.
